entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
